member.name: T:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions
member.summary: Defines methods for dealing with file extensions.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Crypts a string using the MD5Hash algorithm

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a given string is a TrueValue

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to short. Returns 0 if the string is not a number.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to integer. Returns 0 if the string is not a number.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to long. Returns 0 if the string is not a number.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to DateTime. Returns 0 if the string is not a number.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first letter of a string. Returns the string if it's null or empty.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the substring between two specified strings in a given string.
member.param: The input string to be substringed

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string in Cyrillic to a string in Latin.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string in Lating to a string in Cyrillic.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Cyrillic string to Latin and removes specific illegal chracters from it.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces whitespace in a string with "-" and converts the string to a Latin string. Then removes specific illegal chracters from it.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the characters in a string from index 0 to specified range

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension of a filename.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Links a file extension to a pre-defined content type.

member.name: M:PoneNamespaceDaImashe.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to its byte array representation
